name: Starfall (Arix, wolfer122)
description:
Z Q S D  / W A S D to move
Space to jump
Left click to shoot

This game was made using Unity, Photoshop, Aseprite and Pyxel Edit.
The wonderfull team:

- Rjga and MasonWood handeled programming.

- GuyW and Arix crafted the assets

- Kiberptah composed the tracks

- Spadgershat wrote the story
